text: Datɨrɨghɨn gumazamiziba mɨghsɨar dozibar dagheba opari. Eghtɨ gɨn temer ataghatariba itiba ko benir kuraba otivigh mɨghsɨar dozir kaba bar, da avegham. Gumazamiziba dɨkonibar atiating egh me uam mangɨ azenibar ingaran kogham. Puvatɨ. Me pura bulmakauba ko sipsipba ateghtɨ, darara danganir kabar daru dagheba buriam.”
